alert.note: Alert for McLean (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 4:02PM CDT until April 19 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCLEAN COUNTY... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Le Roy, or 12 miles southeast of Bloomington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 3:59 PM, the public reported quarter size hail in Heyworth. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Le Roy around 415 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 143 and 154. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
